title: Had Great Teammate Ribon but no Icon, what's going on?
body:
I just logged in and got my honor participation icon but no Great Teammate icon. I had the Ribbon for years, and at the time the new honor system rolled out so I have no idea why I wouldn't have gotten it. Judging by the posts here it seems a few people got their icons late, but judging by those responses everything was supposed to have gone out by the 30th - so I'm bit concerned since it's a day later and I haven't gotten anything.

Any help would be awesome - thanks!

replies.body: There are a lot of icons and eligible players, so it's going to be a bit to distribute everything out.  We aim to have it completed by Sept 30, hang tight!
